channel.title: CVE Feed for Ericsson -- Packet Core Controller
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Ericsson -- Packet Core Controller

item.title: CVE-2024-25009|2024-08-20T12:00:51.861Z -- ericsson -- packet%20core%20controller
item.description: Ericsson Packet Core Controller (PCC) contains a vulnerability in Access and Mobility Management Function (AMF) where improper input validation can lead to denial of service which may result in service degradation.
